Forensic Science.1: Demonstrate scientific reasoning ability; the use of the scientific method.
Forensic Science.2: Describe the integration of the basic and applied sciences as it is relevant to the forensic sciences.
Forensic Science.3: Understand the theory and practice of  physical, biological, and chemical evidence analysis in the framework of the criminal justice system.
Forensic Science.6: Foster internalization of ethical behavior and professional accountability.
